transArray.content: I often fly around the country, and I really enjoyed my stay at this newly opened Hanting Hotel. Especially the lady at the front desk was very enthusiastic. The facilities in the room are all intelligent and very clean. The stay was very pleasant and comfortable. I I like it and plan to come back next time.
Dear guest, thank you very much for choosing. Summer has the late glow. Just like the little guy who comes late, everyone is smiling. I love you, little guy.
